={{ "SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(numero_facture FROM 'INV-[0-9]{4}-([0-9]+)') AS INTEGER)), 0) + 1 as next_num FROM invoices WHERE tenant_id = '" + $('02. Parser').first().json.tenantId + "' AND numero_facture LIKE 'INV-' || EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW())::text || '-%'" }}
